entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
